description: Redevelopment of the site, including demolition of all existing buildings and structures, comprising new homes across four new buildings and the provision of flexible Class E floorspace at ground level fronting Streatham Vale and Woodgate Drive. Provision of associated private and communal landscaped amenity areas, play space, disabled parking spaces, refuse storage and cycle parking (consolidated and decentralised) with ancillary workshop.(For public consultation purposes the proposed development includes: - Up to 237 homes (Class C3) comprising of the following mix: 4 x studio units, 67 x 1-bed units, 135 x 2-bed units and 31 x 3-bed units;- Four new buildings between part 5 storeys (17.5 metres) and 14 storeys (49 metres) in height; and- 519 sq.m of flexible Class E floorspace designed to serve as a GP Surgery)RE-CONSULTATION FOLLOWING RECEIPT OF NOVEMBER 2023 AMENDMENTS AS FOLLOWS: -        Introduction of a second stair core in blocks A, B and C-        Ground Floor changes to the layout of the landscaping(Adjoining Borough Consultation from London Borough of Lambeth)
